subject: Cybersecurity
title: Weapons and Counterfeit Goods: Beyond Drugs
description: A short lesson to help you apply Weapons and Counterfeit Goods: Beyond Drugs.

hook.text: The dark web sells more than drugs. Counterfeit passports, weapons, and fake currencies are all available.

buildup.text: Dark web vendors offer counterfeit IDs, currencies, diplomas, and luxury goods. Some sell firearms and ammunition.

discovery.text: Counterfeit document vendors use real templates and high-quality printing. Some forged passports have passed.

twist.text: Many weapons listings are scams or law enforcement stings. Actual weapon sales are rarer than media suggests.

climax.text: The dark web mirrors the real black market â€” but with global reach and cryptocurrency payments.

punchline.text: Most dark web weapon sales are scams. Or cops.

quiz.question: What is a common risk when attempting to buy weapons on the dark web?
options: Many listings are scams or law enforcement sting operations
